f1(x) = 8C3*x^3*(1-x)^5 + 8C2*x^3*(1-x)^6 = 4*7*x^3*(1-x)^5*(3 - x)
f2(x) = 8C3*x^3*(1-x)^6 + x

(f2.f1)(x) = 56*(28*x^3*(1-x)^5*(3 - x))^3*(1-28*x^3*(1-x)^5*(3 - x))^6 + 28*x^3*(1-x)^5*(3 - x) 

GoL approaches 0.37017383750367753713

modified GoL approaches 1/1.8311445472359436 = 0.5461065329383578
    - but empirically 1/3.15866329187862 = 0.3165896164276656454


(theoretically seems to 4-loop between 0.54 and 0.34)
0.34629532636829813

0.34629532636829813
